body_html:
Unfortunately weighted_sparse_column doesn't work, this would weight the features, for example genre vs. length.
What I need is to specify all values a feature can have by a probability distribution, like one-hot encoding can also be interpreted as a probability distribution - just that a single value of the feature has 100%

body:
Unfortunately `weighted_sparse_column `doesn't work, this would weight the features, for example genre vs. length.
What I need is to specify all values a feature can have by a probability distribution, like one-hot encoding can also be interpreted as a probability distribution - just that a single value of the feature has 100%
